mcp_tools.description: Validate a resource sheet document against RSMS v2.0 schema. Checks snake_case frontmatter, required fields (subject, parent_project, category), naming convention (-RESOURCE-SHEET.md suffix), and recommended sections. Returns score (0-100), errors, and warnings.

Validate all resource sheet documents in a directory against RSMS v2.0 standards. Automatically scans for files ending with -RESOURCE-SHEET.md. Returns summary with pass/fail counts, average score, and detailed results per file.

Validate any document against UDS schema. Auto-detects document type (foundation, workorder, system, session, etc.) and returns validation results with score (0-100), errors, and warnings. For resource sheets, use validate_resource_sheet instead.
Validate all documents in a directory recursively against UDS schemas. Returns summary with pass/fail counts and average score. For resource sheets only, use check_all_resource_sheets instead.

notes: Papertrail is a validation-focused MCP server. No slash commands as this is a pure MCP tool server. All 4 tools are actively used for UDS (Universal Documentation Standards) and RSMS (Resource Sheet Metadata Standards) validation across the CodeRef ecosystem.
